snippet: The arbitrator, Kathleen Roberts, ruled that Sterling employees may pursue a claim challenging the jeweler’s promotion and pay practices.
abstract: Arbitrator certifies class of thousands of women to proceed to trial in gender discrimination case brought against Sterling Jewlers; company, which owns 12 chains in the United States, has been accused of discriminatory pay and promotion practices.
lead_paragraph: The arbitrator, Kathleen Roberts, ruled that Sterling employees may pursue a claim challenging the jeweler’s promotion and pay practices.

headline.main: Gender Bias Case Against Sterling Jewelers Can Proceed
headline.print_headline: Gender Bias Case Against Sterling Jewelers Can Proceed
